discovery.title: Page Discovery
discovery.description: Choose how pages will be discovered for auditing
discovery.specificUrlsDescription: Enter the URLs you want to audit, one per line.
discovery.pageLimitWarning: More than 200 pages may take significantly longer.
discovery.startUrlDescription: The crawler will discover pages from this URL, following links within the same domain.
discovery.depth1: 1 - Only direct links from the start page
discovery.excludePathsDescription: One path per line. Supports wildcards (*).

errors.cannotExtractDomain: Could not extract domain from provided URLs
errors.loginRequired: You need to be logged in to create a project

AuditFailed.title: The audit failed
AuditFailed.description: Possible causes: site inaccessible, timeout, or configuration error. Check the URL and try again.

Errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

EmagReport.title: eMAG 3.1 Conformance Report
EmagReport.complianceDescription: Assessment against the 45 recommendations of the Electronic Government Accessibility Model
EmagReport.complianceNote: Conformance considers only automatically verified recommendations. Recommendations marked as "Not Tested" require manual verification for complete assessment.
EmagReport.noViolationsDesc: No violations detected for this recommendation
EmagReport.criticalSeriousDesc: Critical or serious violations were detected
EmagReport.notApplicableDesc: This recommendation does not apply to the audited content
EmagReport.noMatchingFilter: No recommendations match the selected filter.
EmagReport.reportFooter: Report automatically generated by the Accessibility Audit Platform. For more information about eMAG, visit: https://emag.governoeletronico.gov.br/

DangerZone.title: Danger Zone
DangerZone.deleteWarning: This action is permanent and irreversible. By deleting this project, you will lose:
DangerZone.deleteError: Error deleting project. Please try again.

SettingsForm.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of the project...
SettingsForm.discoveryDescription: Configure how pages will be discovered for auditing. This configuration will be used in all audits of this project.
SettingsForm.specificUrlsDescription: Add the URLs you want to audit. One per line.
SettingsForm.pageLimitWarning: More than 200 pages may take significantly longer.
SettingsForm.startUrlDescription: The crawler will only follow links within this path.
SettingsForm.depth1: 1 - Only direct links from the start page
SettingsForm.excludePathsDescription: One path per line. Supports wildcards (*).
SettingsForm.authDescription: Configure authentication to audit protected pages
SettingsForm.authNoneDescription: No authentication will be sent with requests
SettingsForm.authBearerDescription: An authorization token will be sent in the Authorization header
SettingsForm.authCookieDescription: Cookies will be sent with requests
SettingsForm.bearerTokenHelp: The token will be sent as: Authorization: Bearer <token>
SettingsForm.defaultsDescription: Set default values for new audits of this project
SettingsForm.wcagLevelsHelp: Select at least one WCAG level for validation

AuditComponents.scoreDescription: The score is calculated based on the total count of passed and failed accessibility rules across all pages.
AuditComponents.scoreTooltip: The score is calculated based on total rules checked, weighted by the severity of violations found.
AuditComponents.issueSummaryDescription: A higher issue severity level indicates a more serious impact on users with disabilities.
AuditComponents.issueSummaryTooltip: Issues are grouped by severity. Higher severities indicate greater impact on the experience of users with disabilities.
AuditComponents.unexpectedChanges: Seeing unexpected changes in issue count?
AuditComponents.severityCriticalDesc: Completely blocks access to essential content for people with disabilities. Represents risk to the organization. Immediate correction, ideally within a week; maximum priority.
AuditComponents.severitySeriousDesc: Creates significant barriers, partially or totally preventing access to essential content. Strongly impacts users of assistive technologies. Should be treated as high priority.
AuditComponents.severityModerateDesc: Causes difficulties but does not block access to essential content. May cause frustration and abandonment of non-essential flows. Prioritize if no more severe items; affects conformance if not corrected.
AuditComponents.severityMinorDesc: Annoying bug, low impact. Fix only if quick and in the same work context; otherwise, do not prioritize. May still affect conformance.
AuditComponents.conformanceTooltip: Overview of accessibility standards conformance. Green indicates passed, red indicates issues found.
AuditComponents.wcagDescription: The grid below displays the Success Criteria (SC) included in WCAG 2.2 AA. Click on an SC to view more details.
AuditComponents.emagDescription: The grid below displays eMAG 3.1 Recommendations. Click on a recommendation to view more details.
AuditComponents.noIssuesFoundTooltip: No violations detected by automated testing for this criterion.
AuditComponents.issuesFoundTooltip: At least one violation was detected during automated testing.
AuditComponents.needsAssistedTestsTooltip: This criterion requires assisted testing with specialized tools.
AuditComponents.needsManualChecksTooltip: This criterion cannot be tested automatically and requires human verification.
AuditComponents.notTestedTooltip: This criterion was not included in the audit scope.
AuditComponents.categoryTooltip: Issues grouped by category for easier prioritization. Categories with more issues should be addressed first.
AuditComponents.conformanceSummaryTooltip: Overview of accessibility standards conformance. Green indicates passed, red indicates issues found.
AuditComponents.conformanceWcagDescription: The grid below displays the Success Criteria (SC) included in WCAG 2.2 AA. Click on an SC to view more details.
AuditComponents.conformanceEmagDescription: The grid below displays eMAG 3.1 Recommendations. Click on a recommendation to view more details.
AuditComponents.statusNoIssuesFoundTooltip: No violations detected by automated testing for this criterion.
AuditComponents.statusIssuesFoundTooltip: At least one violation was detected during automated testing.
AuditComponents.statusNeedsAssistedTestsTooltip: Partial automated detection - possible violation found that requires manual verification to confirm.
AuditComponents.statusNeedsManualChecksTooltip: This criterion cannot be tested automatically and requires human verification.
AuditComponents.statusNotTestedTooltip: This criterion was not included in the audit scope.
AuditComponents.issuesByCategoryTooltip: Issues grouped by category for easier prioritization. Categories with more issues should be addressed first.

AuthConfig.title: Authentication
AuthConfig.description: Configure authentication to audit protected pages
AuthConfig.noAuthDescription: No authentication will be sent with requests
AuthConfig.bearerTokenDescription: An authorization token will be sent in the Authorization header
AuthConfig.cookiesDescription: Cookies will be sent with requests
AuthConfig.tokenHelp: The token will be sent as: Authorization: Bearer <token>

SubdomainPolicyConfig.title: Subdomain Policy
SubdomainPolicyConfig.behavior: Define the behavior of the crawler regarding subdomains
SubdomainPolicyConfig.allowedSubdomainsHelp: Separate with commas or press Enter

StartAudit.dialogDescription: The audit will use the configurations defined in the project. You can change them in settings.
StartAudit.manualPages: {count, plural, =0 {No pages configured} =1 {1 page configured} other {# pages configured}}

ScoreModal.title: How is the accessibility score calculated for this report?
ScoreModal.description: The accessibility score for this report is calculated based on the count of passed and failed accessibility rules across all pages. The formula is:
ScoreModal.sumDescription: Rule counts are multiplied by weight factors based on their severity level. Higher severity rules have greater impact on the score.
ScoreModal.passWeightsDesc: Weights for passed rules: Critical ({critical}), Serious ({serious}), Moderate ({moderate}), Minor ({minor})
ScoreModal.failWeightsReason: Failed rules have higher weights as they represent accessibility barriers.
ScoreModal.failWeightsDesc: Weights for failed rules: Critical ({critical}), Serious ({serious}), Moderate ({moderate}), Minor ({minor})

BrokenPagesCard.title: Pages with Problems ({count})
BrokenPagesCard.description: These pages could not be audited due to loading errors. Check if they are accessible.

ViolationsFilter.searchPlaceholder: Search by rule, description or selector...
ViolationsFilter.noViolationsFiltered: No violations found with applied filters.
ViolationsFilter.noViolationsFound: No violations found! The site is accessible.
ViolationsFilter.copyXPathTooltip: Copy XPath to paste in DevTools
ViolationsFilter.copyCssTooltip: Copy CSS selector to paste in DevTools
ViolationsFilter.pasteXPathHint: Paste in DevTools: F12 → Elements → Ctrl+F → select XPath
ViolationsFilter.pasteCssHint: Paste in DevTools: F12 → Elements → Ctrl+F

inputSemAutocomplete.message: This field appears to collect '{fieldType}' but does not have the appropriate autocomplete attribute. Add autocomplete="{suggestion}" to help browsers autofill and improve accessibility for users with motor or cognitive disabilities.

linkSemUnderline.message: This link within running text is not underlined. Links in text should be underlined or have another distinguishing visual indicator besides color to be accessible to colorblind users.

videoSemLegendas.messageNativo: This video does not have visible captions or closed caption tracks. Verify if captions are available and enable them for deaf or hard of hearing users.
videoSemLegendas.messageIframe: This embedded video ({platform}) does not have visible captions. Verify in the original platform if captions are available and enabled.

videoSemAudiodescricao.message: This video may require audio description for blind users. Verify if the visual content is essential and if an audio description track or audio-described version is available.

selectOnchangeNavega.message: This select appears to navigate or perform an action on change. This can be problematic for screen reader users and keyboard users. Consider adding a separate "Go" button.
